publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-802 Ms Sandra White: The Lodging House Mission-That the Parliament commends the Lodging House Mission, established in 1907 and now a registered charity, based in East Campbell Street, Glasgow, which provides support and advice and over 150 meals per day for the homeless and disadvantaged and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure provision of a funding stream that will allow this vital work to continue.
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Michael Matheson*

S2M-802 Ms Sandra White: The Lodging House Mission-That the Parliament commends the Lodging House Mission, established in 1907 and now a registered charity, based in East Campbell Street, Glasgow, which provides support and advice and over 150 meals per day for the homeless and disadvantaged and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure provision of a funding stream that will allow this vital work to continue. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-802 The Lodging House Mission (lodged on 20 January 2004) Linda Fabiani*
